file_content.text: The Empire and Republic must learn to fight as one. It's the only way to defeat the Eternal Throne.
In this training exercise, you'll work in teams to capture control points. They're only available for a limited time, so hurry.
To score, occupy a control point with more team members than your opponent. Win by reaching a score of six hundred or being in the lead when time expires.
Control points have been activated.
Control points are now active. Seize them, quickly!
New active control points!
Control points have deactivated. Stay vigilant.
Deactivating control points. Get ready to run.
Control points are deactivated. Remain focused.
Battle mods available. Claim them!
Battle mods have been placed.
Deploying battle mods!
Blue Squad has the advantage!
Fantastic teamwork from Blue Squad!
Blue Squad is the one to watch out for!
Purple Squad has seized the lead.
Stay on Purple Squad!
Purple Squad is making the rest of you look bad.
Gold Squad has the upper hand!
Everyone, watch Gold Squad succeed!
Keep an eye on Gold Squad!
Blue Squad is nearly there!
Blue Squad is so close!
You're making it easy for Blue Squad!
Purple Squad has nearly won!
Purple Squad is closing in!
Are you going to let Purple Squad beat you?
Gold Squad is almost there!
Gold Squad is near victory!
Don't let Gold Squad win!
And it's all over! Blue Squad soars to victory. Excellent work, teams.
Blue Squad has won! Enjoy your victory. Everyone else, reflect on why you failed.
Blue Squad achieves a victory worthy of our Alliance! This is how we win wars.
That's it! Purple Squad claims victory. Fantastic work, teams.
Purple Squad wins! You are to be commended. The rest of you failed for a reason. Find it.
And it's final! Purple Squad, your victory gives me hope for this war.
And it's over! Gold Squad's victory makes our Alliance proud.
Gold Squad takes the win! A fantastic show of teamwork. The rest of you, think on your failure.
And there's the win! The Alliance could use more soldiers like Gold Squad.
Yes! This is how you work as a team!
You do the Alliance proud. Excellent work!
A commendable job, but you're not done yet. Keep fighting!
Yes! Grind your opponents into dust! Not literally, of course.
You've swept into the lead. Maintain your focus.
Sending battle mods.
New control points coming up soon.
Control points active. Don't let your opponent take what's yours!
Battle mods are set! Hurry!
Control points down. Stay alert for new ones.
Activating control points. Fight to claim them!
I'll randomly deploy battle mods to give you an edge.
Now show me what the Alliance can do!
